attributes.additional_details:
Offer free education to all people under the age of 25 including University students.

Change the school hours from 8am - 4pm

Give half days to all school children on Fridays

Add the following to the school curriculum

Etiquette Classes
Confidence Classes
Financial Learning (Mortgages, Loans, Finance, etc)
Basic Law
Adult Living (Washing, Cleaning, D.I.Y, etc thing they will need as an adult)
Medical Classes (Basic medical training)
Common sense and Behavior classes
Religious acceptance and Culture Class (Teach them what peoples religions and cultures are about)
Music History (The history of each music genre and some of the greats from each genre, bring people in that can do each genre and teach them) (Some people might like Jazz, Classical, Pop, Punk etc not everyone as the same taste so teach them all of them)


Split History into 2 classes (Modern and Ancient History)

Split Art into 2 classes (Art appreciation and Art/Painting/Drawing etc)
